thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Trump Claims the FBI ‘Spied’ on His Campaign

author: Sadie Gurman
title: Trump Claims the FBI ‘Spied’ on His Campaign
text:
An assertion by President Donald Trump Thursday that federal investigators may have infiltrated his campaign added fuel to a battle between the Justice Department and House Republican lawmakers who want access to highly sensitive materials from the FBI’s Russia investigation.
Mr. Trump didn’t provide evidence for his claim on Twitter that “word seems to be coming out” that the FBI “spied on the campaign with an embedded informant,” an action he said would be “bigger than Watergate.”
...
